name: Tomato
tooltip: Tomatoes need a long growing season, and should be started indoors early. Transplant 2-3 weeks after the last frost.

name: Carrot
tooltip: Carrots are best sown directly into the soil once it has warmed up. Keep the soil moist but not soggy.

name: Lettuce
tooltip: Lettuce can tolerate cooler weather. Start indoors and transplant after the danger of frost has passed.

name: Basil
tooltip: Basil loves the sun and warm weather. Start indoors and transplant when the soil is warm.

name: Peas
tooltip: Peas thrive in cool weather and are best sown directly into the ground. Keep them well-watered.
